languages.text: {n}Кибелла взирает на вас с улыбкой спокойной и печальной.{/n} "Мы миновали хитросплетения лабиринта вместе. Впереди..." {n}В ее глазах мерцают слезы.{/n} "...новые испытания. Но я верю, что, храня в сердцах друг друга, мы преодолеем любую беду. Пойдем, Домин'{name}". {n}Ее шепот едва слышен.{/n} "Очистимся перед тем, как вернуться на свои стези".

{n}Kibellah looks at you, her smile calm and sad.{/n} "We have passed the labyrinth's web. Ahead of us..." {n}Tears glisten in her eyes.{/n} "...are new trials. But I believe that as long as we keep each other in our hearts, we will always prevail. Come, Domin'{name}." {n}She whispers so quietly that you can barely hear her.{/n} "Let's cleanse ourselves before we go back to our threads."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла взирает на вас с улыбкой спокойной и печальной.{/n} "Мы миновали хитросплетения лабиринта вместе. Впереди..." {n}В ее глазах мерцают слезы.{/n} "...новые испытания. Но я верю, что, храня в сердцах друг друга, мы преодолеем любую беду. Пойдем, Домин'{name}". {n}Ее шепот едва слышен.{/n} "Очистимся перед тем, как вернуться на свои стези".

But I believe that as long as we keep each other in our hearts, we will always prevail. Come, Enim'{name}." {n}She whispers so quietly you can barely hear her.{/n} "Let's cleanse ourselves before we go back to our ways."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah te mira con una sonrisa tranquila y triste.{/n} «Hemos atravesado la red del laberinto. Ante nosotros...». {n}Las lágrimas destellan en sus ojos.{/n} «... Esperan nuevas dificultades. Pero creo que, mientras nos llevemos {mf|el uno|la una} a la otra en el corazón, siempre prevaleceremos. Ven, Domin'{name}». {n}Susurra con voz tan queda que apenas consigues oírla.{/n} «Purifiquémonos antes de volver a nuestros hilos».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you, her smile calm and sad.{/n} "We have passed the labyrinth's web. Ahead of us..." {n}Tears glisten in her eyes.{/n} "...are new trials. But I believe that as long as we keep each other in our hearts, we will always prevail. Come, Domin'{name}." {n}She whispers so quietly that you can barely hear her.{/n} "Let's cleanse ourselves before we go back to our threads."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah te mira con una sonrisa tranquila y triste.{/n} «Hemos atravesado la red del laberinto. Ante nosotros...». {n}Las lágrimas destellan en sus ojos.{/n} «... Esperan nuevas dificultades. Pero creo que, mientras nos llevemos {mf|el uno|la una} a la otra en el corazón, siempre prevaleceremos. Ven, Domin'{name}». {n}Susurra con voz tan queda que apenas consigues oírla.{/n} «Purifiquémonos antes de volver a nuestros hilos».

languages.text: {n}キベラがあなたを見つめる。その微笑みは穏やかで悲しげだ。{/n}「迷宮の網を抜けた。この先には…」{n}彼女の目で涙が光る。{/n}「…新たな試練がある。けれど、お互いを心から思いあう限り、必ず勝てると信じている。行きましょう、ドミン・{name}」{n}彼女は、かろうじて聞きとれるだけのかすかな声で囁く。{/n}「それぞれの糸に戻る前に、禊をしましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you, her smile calm and sad.{/n} "We have passed the labyrinth's web. Ahead of us..." {n}Tears glisten in her eyes.{/n} "...are new trials. But I believe that as long as we keep each other in our hearts, we will always prevail. Come, Domin'{name}." {n}She whispers so quietly that you can barely hear her.{/n} "Let's cleanse ourselves before we go back to our threads."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラがあなたを見つめる。その微笑みは穏やかで悲しげだ。{/n}「迷宮の網を抜けた。この先には…」{n}彼女の目で涙が光る。{/n}「…新たな試練がある。けれど、お互いを心から思いあう限り、必ず勝てると信じている。行きましょう、ドミン・{name}」{n}彼女は、かろうじて聞きとれるだけのかすかな声で囁く。{/n}「それぞれの糸に戻る前に、禊をしましょう」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈看着你，露出了平静而哀伤的微笑。{/n}“我们穿过了迷宫的罗网，而在我们面前的……”{n}她眼里闪着泪光。{/n}“……是新的试炼。但我相信，只要我们把彼此放在心中，我们就会无往不利。来吧，秘者{name}。”{n}她低声开了口，你几乎听不见。{/n}“让我们洗净自己的身体，之后回到各自的丝线上吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you, her smile calm and sad.{/n} "We have passed the labyrinth's web. Ahead of us..." {n}Tears glisten in her eyes.{/n} "...are new trials. But I believe that as long as we keep each other in our hearts, we will always prevail. Come, Domin'{name}." {n}She whispers so quietly that you can barely hear her.{/n} "Let's cleanse ourselves before we go back to our threads."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈看着你，露出了平静而哀伤的微笑。{/n}“我们穿过了迷宫的罗网，而在我们面前的……”{n}她眼里闪着泪光。{/n}“……是新的试炼。但我相信，只要我们把彼此放在心中，我们就会无往不利。来吧，秘者{name}。”{n}她低声开了口，你几乎听不见。{/n}“让我们洗净自己的身体，之后回到各自的丝线上吧。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah sieht dich an, ihr Lächeln ist ruhig und traurig.{/n} "Wir haben das Netz des Labyrinths hinter uns gelassen. Vor uns ..." {n}In ihren Augen funkeln Tränen.{/n} "...liegen neue Prüfungen. Aber ich glaube, solange wie einander in unseren Herzen bewahren, werden wir immer bestehen. Kommt, Domin'{name}." {n}Sie flüstert so leise, dass du sie kaum hören kannst.{/n} "Reinigen wir uns, ehe wir zu unseren Fäden zurückkehren."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you, her smile calm and sad.{/n} "We have passed the labyrinth's web. Ahead of us..." {n}Tears glisten in her eyes.{/n} "...are new trials. But I believe that as long as we keep each other in our hearts, we will always prevail. Come, Domin'{name}." {n}She whispers so quietly that you can barely hear her.{/n} "Let's cleanse ourselves before we go back to our threads."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah sieht dich an, ihr Lächeln ist ruhig und traurig.{/n} "Wir haben das Netz des Labyrinths hinter uns gelassen. Vor uns ..." {n}In ihren Augen funkeln Tränen.{/n} "...liegen neue Prüfungen. Aber ich glaube, solange wie einander in unseren Herzen bewahren, werden wir immer bestehen. Kommt, Domin'{name}." {n}Sie flüstert so leise, dass du sie kaum hören kannst.{/n} "Reinigen wir uns, ehe wir zu unseren Fäden zurückkehren."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah vous regarde avec un sourire triste et serein.{/n} « Nous avons franchi la toile du labyrinthe. Devant nous se dressent... » {n}Ses yeux se remplissent de larmes.{/n} « ... autant de nouvelles épreuves. Mais je suis convaincue que rien ne nous arrêtera tant que nos cœurs vibreront au diapason. Venez, Domin'{name}. » {n}Elle murmure d'une voix si basse qu'elle est à peine audible.{/n} « Purifions-nous avant de retourner à nos fils respectifs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you, her smile calm and sad.{/n} "We have passed the labyrinth's web. Ahead of us..." {n}Tears glisten in her eyes.{/n} "...are new trials. But I believe that as long as we keep each other in our hearts, we will always prevail. Come, Domin'{name}." {n}She whispers so quietly that you can barely hear her.{/n} "Let's cleanse ourselves before we go back to our threads."

Devant nous se dressent... » {n}Ses yeux se remplissent de larmes.{/n} « ... autant de nouvelles épreuves. Mais je suis convaincue que rien ne nous arrêtera tant que nos cœurs vibreront au diapason. Venez, Domin'{name}. » {n}Elle murmure d'une voix si basse qu'elle est à peine audible.{/n} « Purifions-nous avant de retourner à nos fils respectifs. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah sana bakıyor. Gülümsemesine sakinlik ve hüzün hâkim.{/n} "Labirentin ağını geçtik. Bizi..." {n}Gözlerindeki yaşlar parıldıyor.{/n} "Yeni sınavlar bekliyor. Ancak birbirimizin yüreğinde yer aldıkça tüm sınavların her daim üstesinden geleceğimize inanıyorum. Gel Domin'{name}." {n}O kadar alçak sesle fısıldıyor ki sesini zorlukla duyuyorsun.{/n} "İpliklerimize geri dönmeden önce kendimizi arındıralım."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah looks at you, her smile calm and sad.{/n} "We have passed the labyrinth's web. Ahead of us..." {n}Tears glisten in her eyes.{/n} "...are new trials. But I believe that as long as we keep each other in our hearts, we will always prevail. Come, Domin'{name}." {n}She whispers so quietly that you can barely hear her.{/n} "Let's cleanse ourselves before we go back to our threads."
